newsitem.title: POLAND: Flag incident shows Papal diplomacy not infallible.
newsitem.headline: Flag incident shows Papal diplomacy not infallible.

text.p: The Vatican's word on moral issues may be infallible but a small international incident involving an upside-down flag on Tuesday showed its Diplomacy is subject to human error.
The Ukrainian flag was flown behind a papal altar platform along with those of the six other countries whose presidents came here to attend a mass by Pope John Paul on the theme of European unity.
But the blue and yellow banner was flown upside-down, with the yellow horizontal stripe on top instead of on the bottom.
Firemen put the banner right before the Pope and Ukrainian President Leonid Kuchma arrived for the service.
